column1: #Text=Suyin says : " And this is my daughter , Opal . "
#Text=Let 's take her back to the airship and get out of here .
#Text=" Suyin says : " And the woman apparently trying to abduct you is your aunt Lin .
#Text=My mom has told so many stories about you .
#Text=" Lin says : " I 'm sure she has .
#Text=" Suyin says : " So I 've set all of you up in the guesthouses while Korra trains Opal .
#Text=But I was hoping she could train with the rest of the airbenders at the Northern Temple .
#Text=This is where Opal 's home and family are .
#Text=" Korra says : " I guess I could help her get started .
#Text=" Korra says : " She 's just a little worried because there 's a bunch of crazy criminals after me .
#Text=" Suyin says : " If you 're concerned about security , do n't be .
#Text=This is the safest city in the world .
#Text=Now I 'll see you all at dinner .
#Text=My chef will blow the taste buds right out of your mouth .
#Text=" Korra says : " Why do you have such a problem with your sister ?
#Text=Come on , we can stay a little while .
